contest-event.event-date:
April 28, 2018 D SEWBBA (Cardiff) Contest (Third Section)
SEWBBA (Merthyr Tydfil) Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Merthyr Tydfil) Contest sewbba-merthyr-tydfil-contest-third-section
Willows High School, Cardiff Best instrumentalist: Duncan Broadley (cornet, Taff Vale) Best euphonium: Aled Daniels (Taff Vale) Winning conductor: Gareth Ritter (Taff Vale) Youngest player: Noah Davies (aged 8, Ynyshir)
May 3, 2018, 11:13 a.m. May 3, 2018, 11:18 a.m.
1 Taff Vale Gareth Ritter Napoleon on the Alps
2 Cross Keys Silver Band Mike Davies The Haslemere Suite
3 Oakdale Silver Band Kerry Bowden A Malvern Suite
4 Usk Brass Band Jamie Jones
5 Ynyshir Band Gary Davies
